name: a date with the voice in my head
name_original: a date with the voice in my head
description:
a date with the voice inside my head is a comedic and short dating sim made for NaNoRenO 2023!

Kiki may exist only in your head, but you love her all the same! Who'd need anything else? Surely not you. And now you get to go on a date with her!!!

Just don't think about reality and you'll be fine, right?

Special thanks to NomnomNami for inspiring us to make this game!!!

CREDITS:
